title: Zazoo
description: Zazoo is Vietnamese by birth but feels entirely French. She has lived with her adoptive Grand-Pierre in France in an old stone mill between the river and the canal since she was two, sharing poetry, adventures, and the predictable rhythms of the seasons. Then one misty October morning, a young man on a bicycle rides into Zazooâ€™s small village and asks a question from which many stories begin to unfold. A love story within a love story.
author: Richard Mosher
